Board.name: algebra_guesscount
Board.author: Pascal Georges (pascal.georges1@free.fr)
Board.title: Find the series of correct operations that matches the given answer
Board.description: Work out the right combination of numbers and operations to match the given value
Board.prerequisite: The four arithmetic operations. Combine several arithmetic operations.
Board.goal: Deploy a strategy to arrange a set of arithmetic operations to match a given value.
Board.manual: At the top of the board area, choose the numbers and arithmetic operators that give the specified result. You can deselect a number or operator by clicking on it again.
